full_title: God of wonders (Live in Philadelphia, PA) by Third Day
title: God of wonders (Live in Philadelphia, PA)
title_with_featured: God of wonders (Live in Philadelphia, PA)
lyrics:
2 ContributorsGod of wonders (Live in Philadelphia, PA) LyricsWow Worship Yellow album version, which is the same as the version on Wow Hits 2001, and on City On A Hill:
Lord of heaven and earth
Lord of all creation
Lord of heaven and earth

Lord of all creation
Of water, earth and sky
The heavens are Your tabernacle
Glory to the Lord on high

God of wonders beyond our galaxy
You are holy, holy
The universe declares Your majesty
You are holy, holy
Lord of heaven and earth
Lord of heaven and earth

Early in the morning
I will celebrate the light
When I stumble in the darkness (I will call Your name by night)
I will call Your name by night

God of wonders beyond our galaxy
You are holy, holy
The universe declares Your majesty
You are holy, holy
Lord of heaven and earth
Lord of heaven and earth
Lord of heaven and earth

Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth
Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth

Holy, holy
Holy, holy

God of wonders beyond our galaxy
You are holy, holy
Precious Lord, reveal Your heart to me (Holy, Holy)
Father, holy, holy (Holy God Almighty)
The universe declares Your majesty
You are holy, yes You are holy
Holy, holy

Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth
Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth
Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth

Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth
Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth
Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth
